name: From Whence We Came (amazurr)
description:
A visual novel in which you, the player, experience a day in the life of your assigned character and have to make difficult, life-changing decisions. What decisions will you make?

===========================================================

Credits

Abigail Agostin - Programming,  Technical Development, Script Editing, and Tree Asset

Alyssa Mazur - Sprite Assets

Brenden Moloney, Kendall Pastreich, Isaiah Rettig - Writing Team

Jackson Smith (Dad's Last Nerve) - Music Composition/Production

Noah Ines (BobTheGUYYYYY) - Arrangement on "Ness Date"
